string.text: The Storm has begun
The Storm has ended
Find the artefact for Lanky
Lucius, I can't see... It's some kind of blowout I've never seen before... I'm heading underground. I can't stay out here for long. I'll send you the coordissssssssssssss...
The storm's changed direction! It looks like some areas are now safe to re-enter! I can't wait to see what's out there!
The storm's changed again. Looks like only the NPP area's still affected!
The storm's finally passed! All readings indicate that everywhere's clear - even the NPP! I'm on my way there now!
Marked One, your repair has been completed, and is ready for collection
You've found all the bars. An important entry has been added to your diary!
You think it is so easy, Marked One? Distinguishing what is real, and what is just in your mind?
Run! Run as fast as you can through the rooftop portals! You may just make it...
Don't forget Doc's book. It might be around here somewhere...
Krohobor
Hardcore trader in the far northeast of the Zone. Very little else is known about him
Any news of the storm?
Just that it's engulfed all the regions around the NPP. I've not talked to anyone who's been there yet...
I really need to get into the storm areas. Got any ideas?
Maybe the underground, but that's all I can suggest, sorry
That's no use to me. I need to be above ground to find what I'm looking for
Well, maybe Lanky could put a special suit together for you. It might protect your ass. Wouldn't want your brains to fry, would we?
You know, that's what I like about you, Barkeep. You don't say much, but when you do, it's usually shit. Don't you agree?
This storm is really starting to get on my nerves!
Hmm, you look like you've been on vacation to the Riviera...
Yeah, and you haven't changed a bit. You're still the same old grumpy old bastard...
Say, you heard the news? Seems that that AX guy got himself caught out in the open for too long...
What happened to him - and where?
I've no idea if he's dead, or worse, but I know he was trying to get something from the generators up North when it happened...
Shit, I need to find out what happened to him, and if he was after my Soul Cube! Back into the storm once more...
How's life these days, old friend?
Pretty dull. But that's how I like it nowadays. And you?
Same as always. Finding trouble in all the wrong places...
Hmm. Well, try and keep it out of here, will you?
You serious? This has always been one of those Wrong Places! But I'll let you off the hook this time...
You're still an asshole...
Ah, and to think I always took you for the insensitive type...
Is there any way I can get a suit that'll protect me from this storm?
I do have one I've just finished, using a special artefact
You interested in selling it?
Well, I can't sell it if it's not fully proven - but if you're happy to replace the expensive artefact I used, then I'd be happy to let you test it!
You mean you don't know if it works? Shit, what artefact do you need?

It's a very unusual one - a Mushroom artefact. Last time I heard of one was near a rare anti-gravity anomaly in Facility F1. A Stalker told me he'd seen one there but, as much as he tried, he couldn't get it out. He was really pissed about that... You might try some of the old Labs too, you never know...\nAnyway, get me one of those and the suit's yours, providing you bring back a full field report on it. I'll give you a form...
Okay, I'll get you one, but that suit had better be fricking gold plated!
I'm here for the storm suit...
Ah, you have the Mushroom artefact. Well done! Here's the suit, and don't forget your form...
You must know how much a Mushroom artefact goes for, which makes this a hellishly expensive prototype! It'd better work!
Hey, nobody's forcing you to do this. You can get around in that area through the underground passages...
Crap. I don't have that option...

As you wish, but be warned - There's a maximum amount of time you can be in this kind of storm before the suit will start to weaken, so please make your excursion brief. Otherwise, we'll never know if it worked...
Thanks. I'll be sure to come back alive to let you know...
I need my suit repaired, please
Let's see... Oh, you need a new Mushroom artefact. We've none here, but if you can find one I can fix it for you
Thanks. I'll see what I can do...
You have a Mushroom artefact? Good, then let me have the suit
When will it be ready?
It's a specialist job - not to be rushed. It'll be done when it's done...
Okay, but don't take forever on it. I need it ASAP
Don't worry. We're on top of our game here!
Thanks, just let me know as soon as it's finished...
Thank you very much. I need to leave now...
Okay. Fare thee well, Spartacus...
Yeah, I salute you too. Will the one finger do? Thanks for the repair, though. I do appreciate it...
Why the bad mood?
This storm is costing me a lot of business, that's why!
Ah. Money. Of course...
Hey, did the suit work? I have a job for you, if you're able to get into the NPP...
That's right in the center of the storm. What's there that's so valuable?
Mushroom artefacts of course! The ones spawned by the NPP Generators have been charged by the storm, making them extremely powerful. They're selling at unbelievable prices!
I need some myself, but if there are any spare I'll get them for you... For a slightly more believable price, of course!
Still on the lookout for Mushroom artefacts?
Sure. I'll take as many as you've got!
Here's one for you...
Excellent, and here's your cash
I'm glad the storm has finally weakened!
Yeah, but that crazy gold rush into the outer edges is causing mayhem...
Most of them have no idea what's in there. They're in for a nightmare...
Keep the nightmares to yourself. Have a drink...
Hey, Sid, any news?
Only thing anyone cares about around here is that storm...
Yes, it's really strange. I wonder what caused it...
I don't know, but I sure hope it burns itself out soon, and doesn't come this way!
Sid, old friend. How's life in the afterstorm?
Marked One! Good to see you! What have you been up to?
Same old stuff. I probably saved the world a couple times but, hey, who's counting?
I was going to offer you a drink, but I think maybe you had enough already!
What are you guarding, way out here?
Nothing. Just waiting for some friends of mine
Looks like you've been stood up... Heard any news lately?
Ha! Good one... But actually, I did hear something really strange. Somebody stole a troop carrier in F1, and it's rumored to be loaded down with gold bars...
Hmm. Where do you think it went? Aren't you interested in looking for it?
Hell, no! I wouldn't go anywhere near that hotbed. It's probably a lie, anyway...
Yes, very likely. See you around...
Nice to see some old faces still kickin!
Salutations to you too, what you doing around here?
Keeping the hell out of that storm!
Heard chatter about a storm around the NPP, got any idea what happened?
Not a clue... ahhhh... how's life around here these days?
Same old crap... somehow I bet your involved with what happened up North aren't you..
Me?!... why would you say that?

Not too long ago a group of Soldiers the likes of which I have never seen before were through here looking for you, 'Marked One'..\nThey were the kind you don't mess with but I still played dumb. Told them I had heard that you bought it in the Radar
Appreciate it... you take care
Glad to see you survived the storm!
Luckily it never made it this far
Any news from around here?
Been several loners and factions passing through here on their way to the NPP since the storm stopped
Seen anything from that group that was looking for me earlier?
As a matter of fact they just passed through yesterday and were still asking about you
Well I guess I should avoid the NPP for awhile, eh..
By the looks of them I would stay away for good!
Well... thanks for the advice, see ya
Greetings Scarecrow, any chance you saw a Military person with a strange patch?
Yes I did! He wanted to know where a safe sleeping place was, I told him the underpass just over there was his best bet.
Thanks, I owe you one.
Area where a Mushroom Artifact was last seen
Marked One, that was crap about the cube! Just found out it was part of the explosion way up North, good luck!
Could the Soul Cube be here?
Anything interesting lately?
Same old fantasies as usual.
Like what?
How about the explosion way up North, something about a crystal of some sort.
Anything else about it?
What.. do I look like a news reporter to you? Bug Off!
Out of Vodka eh..
Heard any strange chatter?
Some nut was around a bit back ranting about Gold Bars, really obsessed with it!
What was he saying?
Something about them being special.
Special?
Strange markings, secret tunnels, Alien teleports.. sick in the head from the radiation!
Pretty far out there, Later..
You ever been to the old Research Institute?
Hell No! A friend of mine came back from there totally bonkers!
Why do you say that?
He was talking gibberish about these weird places that held treasures but were surrounded by huge monsters. Things floating around, little gremlins...
Sounds like he really got the crap scared out of him eh..
Poor guy decided to jump into an anomaly up the hill back there and ended it all.
WOW.. I better stay clear of there! Thanks!
Heard about the big storm up North?
Probably some Monolith trick to keep us out!
Why the Monolith?
Who else would create something like that?
Got a point.
Yep! Trying to monopolize on all the rare artifacts there no doubt!
That storm won't keep me out!
What do you know about the OC?
Bunch of crap.. fireside stories is all.
Really think so?
A collective conscious controlling the zone, come on..
You don't find it strange that the storm is centered over the NPP?
Probably some kind of aftershock caused it.
Maybe so..
Ever seen a Mushroom Artifact?
Heard of em but never seen one myself.
Did you hear where they might have been seen?
Some stranger awhile back said he saw one in the F1 area.
Why didn't he get it?
Said something about a floating Island surrounded by anti-grav anomalies and many monsters.
Sounds like he had a few too many if you ask me!
MAYDAY, MAYDAY... Landing site has been invaded! Evacuating to Site BR01, notify agent AX immediately, over.
What happened to our support?! Let all know that Marked One is a COWARD and has left us to die!
